resources.string: You haven\'t set a passphrase yet!
Are you sure you would like to immediately trim all conversation threads to the %s most recent messages?
Unregistering from Signal messages and calls...
Disable Signal messages and calls by unregistering from the server. You will need to re-register your phone number to use them again in the future.
Touch to change your default SMS app
Touch to make Signal your default SMS app
Can\'t find an app to select media.

The identifying key material for %1$s has changed. This could either mean that someone is trying to intercept your communication, or that %2$s simply re-installed Signal and now has a new identity key.
You may wish to verify this contact.

This media has been stored in an encrypted database. Unfortunately, to view it with an external content viewer currently requires the data to be temporarily decrypted and written to disk. Are you sure that you would like to do this?
Error, received stale key exchange message.
Received key exchange message, click to process.
This message will not be encrypted because the recipient is no longer a Signal user.\n\nSend unsecured message?
Can\'t find an app able to open this media.
Are you sure that you want to reset this secure session?
Are you sure that you want to permanently delete this conversation?
Sorry, there was an error setting your attachment.
The gif you selected was too big!
Sorry, the selected video exceeds message size restrictions (%1$skB).
Sorry, the selected audio exceeds message size restrictions (%1$skB).
Recipient is not a valid SMS or email address!
This device does not appear to support dial actions.
Are you sure you want to leave this group?
This message cannot be sent since your carrier doesn\'t support MMS.
Are you sure you want to unblock this contact?
Attachment exceeds size limits for the type of message you\'re sending.

plurals.name: ConversationFragment_this_will_permanently_delete_all_n_selected_messages
plurals.item: This will permanently delete the selected message.
This will permanently delete all %1$d selected messages.

resources.string: Saving this media to storage will allow any other apps on your device to access it.\n\nContinue?
Error while saving attachment to storage!

plurals.name: ConversationListFragment_this_will_permanently_delete_all_n_selected_conversations
plurals.item: This will permanently delete the selected conversation.
This will permanently delete all %1$d selected conversations.

resources.string: By unlinking this device, it will no longer be able to send or receive messages.
TextSecure and RedPhone are now one private messenger, for every situation: Signal.
TextSecure and RedPhone are now one app: Signal. Tap to explore.
Warning, this will export the plaintext contents of your Signal messages to storage.
Error, unable to write to storage.
Signal was unable to register with Google Play Services. Communication over the data channel has been disabled, please try re-registering from the Signal settings menu.
You have selected a contact that doesn\'t support Signal groups, so this group will be MMS.
You\'re not registered for using the data channel, so Signal groups are disabled.
An unexpected error happened that has made group creation fail.
You need at least one person in your group!
One of the members of your group has a number that can\'t be read correctly. Please fix or remove that contact and try again.
Couldn\'t add %1$s because they\'re not a Signal user.
This will import messages from the system\'s default SMS database to Signal. If you\'ve previously imported the system\'s SMS database, importing again will result in duplicated messages.
Restoring an encrypted backup will completely replace your existing keys, preferences, and messages. You will lose any information that\'s in your current Signal install but not in the backup.
This will import messages from a plaintext backup. If you\'ve previously imported this backup, importing again will result in duplicated messages.
It looks like you don\'t have any apps to share to.
Friends don\'t let friends chat unencrypted.
Signal needs Barcode Scanner for QR codes.
Error reading wireless provider MMS settings...
Received a message encrypted using an old version of Signal that is no longer supported. Please ask the sender to update to the most recent version and resend the message.
- Read all your messages \n- Send messages in your name
Sorry, you have too many devices linked already, try removing some...
The version of Google Play Services you have installed is not functioning correctly. Please reinstall Google Play Services and try again.
If you enjoy using this app, please take a moment to help us by rating it.
You will no longer receive messages or calls from this user.
Are you sure you want to unblock this contact?
The number you dialed does not support secure voice!
You must specify your country code
You must specify your phone number
The number you specified (%s) is invalid.

Sorry, this device is not supported for data messaging. Devices running versions of Android older than 4.0 must have a registered Google Account. Devices running Android 4.0 or newer do not require a Google account, but must have the Play Store app installed.
Double-check that this is your number! We\'re about to verify it with an SMS.
You must enter the code you received first...
Unable to connect. Please check your network connection and try again.
The verification code you submitted is incorrect. Please try again.
You\'ve submitted an incorrect verification code too many times. Please wait a minute before trying again.
The server encountered an error. Please try again.
You\'ve already recently requested a voice call. You can request another in 20 minutes.
This number is already registered on a different Signal server (CyanogenMod?). You must unregister there before registering here.
Signal registration has encountered a problem.
Received key exchange message for invalid protocol version.
Received message with unknown identity key. Click to process and display.
Received updated but unknown identity information. Tap to validate identity.
You do not have an identity key.
WARNING, the scanned key DOES NOT match! Please check the fingerprint text carefully.
Their key is correct. It is also necessary to verify your key with them as well.
You don\'t have an identity key!
You do not have an identity key.
WARNING, the scanned key DOES NOT match!
Tap and configure MMS settings to continue download.
MMS message encrypted for non-existing session...
Touch to open, or touch the lock to close.
Quick response unavailable when Signal is locked!
Could not grab logs from your device. You can still use ADB to get debug logs instead.
Would you like to import your existing text messages into Signal\'s encrypted database?
The default system database will not be modified or altered in any way.
This could take a moment. Please be patient, we\'ll notify you when the import is complete.
Export a plaintext backup compatible with \'SMS Backup & Restore\' to storage
Import the database from the default system messenger app
Restore a previously exported encrypted Signal backup
Import a plaintext backup file. Compatible with \'SMS Backup & Restore.\'
Manual MMS settings are required for your phone.
The text entered was not a valid URI
The text entered was not a valid host

Signal requires MMS settings to deliver media and group messages through your wireless carrier. Your device does not make this information available, which is occasionally true for locked devices and other restrictive configurations.

To send media and group messages, click \'OK\' and complete the requested settings. The MMS settings for your carrier can generally be located by searching for \'your carrier APN\'. You will only need to do this once.
Verify your phone number to connect with Signal.
YOUR COUNTRY CODE AND PHONE NUMBER
Registration transmits some contact information to the server. It is not stored.

Some third party text messaging clients, such as Handcent or GoSMS, behave poorly and intercept all incoming SMS messages. Check to see if you received a text message that starts with \'Your Signal verification code:\', in which case you\'ll need to configure your third party text messaging app to let text messages through.
Please check to make sure you entered your number correctly, and that it is formatted correctly for your region.
Signal will not work with Google Voice numbers.
Signal can also call you to verify your number. Tap \'Call Me\' and enter the six digit code that you hear below.
Signal was unable to connect to the push service.
Your device needs network connectivity in order to use this Signal feature. Check to ensure that it is connected to 3G or Wi-Fi.
If you are connected via Wi-Fi, it\'s possible that there is a firewall blocking access to the Signal server. Try another network or mobile data.
Signal will now automatically verify your number with a confirmation SMS message.
This could take a moment. Please be patient, we\'ll notify you when verification is complete.
Signal timed out while waiting for a verification SMS message.
Use Signal for all incoming text messages
Use Signal for all incoming multimedia messages
Replace the smiley key with an Enter key
Pressing the Enter key will send text messages
Choose your contact entry from the contacts list.
Block screenshots in the recents list and inside the app
Forget passphrase from memory after some interval
The amount of time to wait before forgetting passphrase from memory
Play notification sound when viewing an active conversation
Override system MMS settings with the information below.
Request a delivery report for each SMS message you send
Automatically delete older messages once a conversation thread exceeds a specified length
Scan through all conversation threads and enforce conversation length limits
Free private messages and calls to Signal users
Enable if your device uses SMS/MMS delivery over WiFi (only enable when \'WiFi Calling\' is enabled on your device)
Your build of Signal has expired!
Messages will no longer send successfully, please update to the most recent version.
Tap to make Signal your default SMS app.
Tap to copy your phone\'s SMS messages into its encrypted database.
Take your conversation with %1$s to the next level.
The more friends use Signal, the better it gets.
